page.title: 16RECREATION IN ENFIELD
page.content: In Enfield there are a few parks but the biggest is Whitewebbs. The best park for fishing is Hilly Fields because Turkey Brook runs through it. Whitewebbs has a 'pitch 'n' put' course and an 18 hole golf course. Hilly Fields is a lovely park mostly used for dog walking. It has no amusements such as swings and slides but it has a brook running along the valley in the middle. There are some lovely trees and steep hills with a few trees on them. In Winter these hills and slopes are used for sledging and skiing. Tuckers is also a park but is quite a contrast to Hilly Fields. There are lots of swings and slides. There are sports pitches including soccer and rounders.
